metadata.name: 8:14 PM
metadata.description:
December 2, 2019 8:14 PM

expressive • digital manipulation • hand-drawn • 750x715 • JPEG

on December 2, 2019 i drew for hours. this is the 1st drawing from that night. two days later a fast moving skin infection nearly killed me and i ended up in the hospital for 8 days. the timing of this drawing session right before almost dying lead me to start drawing every day, and i plan to keep it up until i die.
